# add_definitions(-DGLEW_STATIC)

if ("${PROTEAN3D_GL_VARIANT}"  STREQUAL "GL")
  if ("${PROTEAN3D_GL_VERSION_MAJOR}" EQUAL 3)
    FILE(GLOB PROTEAN3D_GL_SOURCES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/glloadgen/GL_3_3/*.*)     
  elseif ("${PROTEAN3D_GL_VERSION_MAJOR}"  EQUAL 4)
    FILE(GLOB PROTEAN3D_GL_SOURCES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/glloadgen/GL_4_2/*.*)     
  endif()
elseif ("${PROTEAN3D_GL_VARIANT}"  STREQUAL "ES")
  # ES header  
endif()


set (PROTEAN3D_GL_SOURCES ${PROTEAN3D_GL_SOURCES} PARENT_SCOPE)
